title: Process Consumer Reviews for Caring.com
snippet:
Caring.com helps 2.5 million people monthly find senior housing for their loved ones. We collect consumer reviews on senior living communities to help families make the most informed choice possible. Our team is looking for someone who can help with processing these reviews. 

What you'll get to do: 
- Learn about our site's terms of use, community code of conduct, and review guidelines
- Monitor the moderation queue on a daily basis
- For each review, determine whether to approve, reject, or escalate (~ 200 daily)
- Provide feedback about gaps in our review guidelines 

We are looking for someone with first-hand experience in moderating community content. If you understand the difference, say, between personal opinions and libelous comments, we want to talk to you! You'll be helping a team with a great social mission.
